argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | leatom.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | leatom.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | leatom.z | |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) |
| 4 |  | leatom.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_leatb | |- ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) -> ( X .<_ P <-> ( X = P \/ X = .0. ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_biimpa | |- ( ( ( K e. OP /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) /\ X .<_ P ) -> ( X = P \/ X = .0. ) ) |
